issue.title: [CF 501] Add LFR as an Instance Type
issue.body:
I've already applied and tested this change to my local copy of TMW, seems like it would be something useful to add.
Adds Raid Finder as a type in the Instance Type conditional.

Change Env.GetZoneType() at line 515 in conditions.lua to

``` function Env.GetZoneType() local _, z = IsInInstance() if z == "pvp" then return 1 elseif z == "arena" then return 2 elseif z == "party" then return 2 + GetInstanceDifficulty() --3-4 elseif z == "raid" and IsPartyLFG() then return 5 elseif z == "raid" then return 5 + GetInstanceDifficulty() --6-9 else return 0 end end ```

Change max at line 1424 to 9, and change the table in instance type at 1426 to

``` texttable = { [0] = NONE, [1] = BATTLEGROUND, [2] = ARENA, [3] = DUNGEON_DIFFICULTY1, [4] = DUNGEON_DIFFICULTY2, [5] = RAID_FINDER, [6] = RAID_DIFFICULTY1, [7] = RAID_DIFFICULTY2, [8] = RAID_DIFFICULTY3, [9] = RAID_DIFFICULTY4, }, ```



> Posted by CurseForge user pikapikatrap | Imported from CurseForge issue #501 | Raw
